feedback:
The plan does not specify how the 'date of joining' field will be made optional for existing records in the database.
Step 4 should include details on how to handle existing records in the database that do not have the 'date of joining' field.
The plan does not mention how to handle potential errors or exceptions during the database schema update.
There is no mention of how the migration script will be implemented or what it will entail.
Step 3 should specify how the backend will differentiate between new and existing registrations when validating the 'date of joining' field.
The plan does not address how to handle timezone differences when validating the 'date of joining' field.
